title: Bots....
body:
So does reporting do anything riot? like i've been reporting bots in aram (same accounts) for weeks and you've still let them play... how the fuck is that "good community".

Are you ever gonna actually ban bot accounts or just keep banning people and leaverbusting people cos that's the easy way to do things...

Come on Riot sort it out guys   {{summoner:11}}  these pricks already :D

replies.body:
Just had this guy in a ranked flex que....he has been doing this for so many games yet RIOT still hasn't banned him wtf????

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=killtaiwanese012

PR stunts is all i see
never have i had a response from RIOT about someone i reported. Since i am Bronze reports happen almost every 2nd game.
I believe RIOT doesnt care.
My wallet is closed.

I made a long post (rant) about this 2 days ago...   looks like my post got deleted.   Basically,  riot dgaf about bots,  or about their players.   I've had a gutful of these endless bots and the non-stop bad behaviour and afks.   Riot can take their horribly run game and stick it.  I won't be back.   If this was a general store or supermarket they would've gone bankrupt by now, because they treat their consumers like morons and give them very little respect.     Don't expect any comment from Riot about this, in fact their silence over the years on the countless threads about this same topic just says one thing.     Gtfo, we (riot) don't want to discuss this so go away.  Same with their totally useless reporting  system  -  it does nothing, zero, zilch!  In summary...  riot are useless  and treat their customers with zero respect.
Go find a better game.  I have.

Your post was deleted because you posted it in the wrong board. Help and Support isn't seen on the homepage, and is mostly for technical issues rather than discussion based topics. Your post was linked in the delete notification (it's your post so you can still see it with the link) so you could repost in the correct board. You can find your notifications at the top right of the boards page.

i just want them to tell me that reporting does nothing and that they dont care, at least then if im playing a bot game for the ip bonus i can just play something snowbally so the bots cant give me a hard time
